title: One change I want to see in URF
body: Trynd ult needs to be reduced to 1 or 2 seconds, considering it's got -80% cdr it's only fair to reduce the duration by 80%

replies.body: Why would it be "fair" to do that for one ability in the game and no others?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E4EgQFXP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-04T08:47:46.317+0000)
>
> Why would it be "fair" to do that for one ability in the game and no others?

Shields and heals are weakened until the game hits a certain point in time. Trynd's ult just isn't a heal or shield so it escapes this, even though it's something that works a similar purpose to shields and heals, the ability to survive longer.

> [{quoted}](name=General Esdeath ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E4EgQFXP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-11-04T21:39:49.914+0000)
>
> Shields and heals are weakened until the game hits a certain point in time. Trynd's ult just isn't a heal or shield so it escapes this, even though it's something that works a similar purpose to shields and heals, the ability to survive longer.

Kayle ult, Vlad W, etc.?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E4EgQFXP,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-11-04T21:56:55.885+0000)
>
> Kayle ult, Vlad W, etc.?

Kayle's ult duration scales with levels, Vlad's W can be cut too but it doesn't let him use Q or autos

> [{quoted}](name=General Esdeath ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E4EgQFXP,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-05T01:10:23.441+0000)
>
> Kayle's ult duration scales with levels, Vlad's W can be cut too but it doesn't let him use Q or autos

The power of Tryn's ult scales with rank as well (fury gained and remaining health after it ends). Kayle's ult may not allow her to attack, but it can be used on any allied champion rather than just herself, and it actually prevents damage.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E4EgQFXP,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-05T01:13:56.242+0000)
>
> The power of Tryn's ult scales with rank as well (fury gained and remaining health after it ends). Kayle's ult may not allow her to attack, but it can be used on any allied champion rather than just herself, and it actually prevents damage.

But we're talking about duration, and if Kayle and Trynd lose time on their ults, they both work the same way at the end.

Personally I'd like to see CC durations reduced by 1/2 in URF.....

Morg + Jhin is sooooooooooooo much fun to play against.
Better yet rework the piece of shit entirely.
80% cooldown reduction on ability **cooldown**, not ability **duration**.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E4EgQFXP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-04T08:30:15.023+0000)
>
> 80% cooldown reduction on ability **cooldown**, not ability **duration**.

Then we need to get rid of the reduction to healing and shielding on champs in URF
One thing I'd like to see happen to URF is it's complete retirement.
